title: Lake Macquarie Coastal Escape Just 90 Minutes from Sydney
description: Your secluded seaside retreat awaits on the rugged NSW coastline overlooking the glittering Pacific Ocean, just 90 minutes from Sydney and 150 metres from the pristine Caves Beach Dunes in Lake Macquarie at Caves Coastal Bar & Bungalows. The ultimate laidback getaway, whisk your partner away with a beach bungalow stay overlooking the lagoon with a decadent daily breakfast at Boffee Coffee, a AU$50 resort food and beverage credit and guaranteed 12pm late checkout. Getting away with friends? With a selection of boutique bungalows, villas and townhouses from two up to six people available, you'll be able to enjoy the ultimate coastal escape with friends or family.

title: Lake Macquarie Beachfront Escape with Gourmet Grazing Hamper & Champagne
description:
Treat yourself to the ultimate laidback escape at the stylish Caves Coastal Bar & Bungalows, a beachfront paradise located just steps from Caves Beach in New South Wales' Lake Macquarie region. Set on the rugged coastline overlooking the glittering waters of the Pacific Ocean, this beachfront gem is an easy drive from Sydney, Newcastle and the Hunter Valley - making it the perfect destination for a relaxing break.

Your Hamptons-style waterfront escape includes a bottle of Moët & Chandon Champagne, a gourmet hamper filled with sweet and savoury delicacies, a welcome drink on arrival and two-for-one breakfast on weekends.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Check out the Two-Bedroom Ocean View Villa and the ultra-luxe Two-Bedroom Ocean View Townhouse for four.
offer_address: 27 Mawson Close, Caves Beach, New South Wales 2281, Australia

title: Caves Beach: Romantic Oceanfront Retreat
description: Indulge in beachfront luxury amid the dunes of Caves Beach on New South Wale's beautiful coastline, just 90 minutes' drive from Sydney. Enjoy a two-night romantic getaway in a Beach Suite with ocean views, a daily breakfast pack, welcome cocktails on arrival, complimentary pizza and late midday checkout for two adults. Travel until 16 December 2018 with no blackout dates!

title: Lake Macquarie Bungalow Bliss with Beachfront Location, Gourmet Grazing Platter & Champagne
description:
Treat yourself to the ultimate laidback escape at the stylish Caves Coastal Bar & Bungalows, just steps from Caves Beach in New South Wales' Lake Macquarie region. Set on the coastline overlooking the glittering waters of the Pacific Ocean, this beachfront gem -  which boasts romantic deluxe bungalows, stunning townhouses and private villas -  is a haven of contemporary design, luxurious amenities, and breathtaking views. The easy drive from Sydney, Newcastle, and the Hunter Valley makes this the perfect destination for a relaxing break.

A collection of Hamptons-style stays, each is perfect for couples or groups and made for laidback coastal living. Go for sun-kissed walks on the beaches and trails, explore the caves at low tide, try your hand at watersports, enjoy a picnic or barbecue or head into town to visit the cafes and boutiques. If you want to stay closer to home, visit the onsite restaurant, where seasonal dishes are paired with panoramic beach views. Enjoy freshly shucked oysters, wood-fired pizzas and more delicious bites showcasing the best local produce, or head to the expansive outdoor deck to soak up the fresh sea air in a relaxed environment.
offer_address: 27 Mawson Close, Caves Beach, New South Wales 2281, Australia

title: Relax Between Lake Macquarie and the Pacific Ocean - Just 90 Minutes from Sydney
description: Indulge in beachfront luxury amid the dunes of Caves Beach on New South Wales’ beautiful coastline, just 90 minutes' drive from Sydney. Nestled between Lake Macquarie and the Pacific Ocean, Caves Coastal Bar & Bungalows offers the perfect laidback self-catering getaway. Choose from a selection of suites, villas and townhouses valid for groups from two to six people, with cocktails, a bottle of wine, complimentary pizza, late checkout and more included.
